title: PLS TAKE AWAY MY PERMA BAN
body: I sadly got perma banned on my main account that i have put lots of time and money into because my cousin logged onto my account after he begged for the password and username which i stupidly gave him and in the game he was playing was was extremely toxic and got my account perma banned. I have been very sad and depressed since this happened because i work a minimum wage job and can hardly pay my rent. But over the months ive invested a lot of money into this account and now its gone and I dont know what im going to do. The account username was **[REDACTED]**. If there is anything you can do to help... please do :(

replies.body: OP, you should also know that account-sharing is already forbidden and a permabannable offense, so giving your data to your cosuin is already reason for a permaban, your cousins toxicity notwithstanding.
If any Riot Employee is reading this. I beg for your help.

In order to appeal an account suspension, you'll need to reach out to an account specialist through a [support ticket.
](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

I've also edited your original post to remove your account name. Please be more careful to not post that sensitive info on a public board such as this.

Let me know if you have any questions.

happened to me too, you aren't getting it back. I spent close to 400$ on my banned account. its very harsh. They should only go as far as permanently chat banning you unless you cross the line with threats and racism, hacks etc. You can beg for it back all you want but they literally don't care about you. You're just a number to them. I'm sorry man, absolutely sucks.

You knew the rules, you broke them.

No amount of money you spent on a free game for access to their content gives you a free pass to be a toxic player in this community.
